bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with mei chuang 眉瘡 , eyebrow sores. Wai ke jing yi 外科精義 Lj: 治小兒面湮 瘡，俗云煉銀瘡者，是母受胎之日，食酸辣及邪味過度，多生此瘡 , “To cure facial clog-up sores in children. This is commonly called ‘ tempered-silver sores ’. When a mother, on the day she conceives the child, eats too much sour and peppery food or bad substances, [the child] is likely to develop these sores”.
